  • Constructor Details

    • Magazine

      public Magazine(String id, String name, int pagesNumber, Calendar publicationDate, String url, double subscriptionValue, int issuanceFreqOpt, int categoryOpt)
      Constructor for the Magazine class.
      pre:
      Parameters "IssuanceFreqOpt" and "categoryOpt" must be an integer value between 1 and 3.
      post:
      A new instance of the Magazine class is created.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the magazine.
      name - The name of the magazine.
      pagesNumber - The pages number of the magazine.
      publicationDate - The publication date of the magazine.
      url - The URL of the repository with the magazine cover.
      subscriptionValue - The subscription value of the magazine.
      issuanceFreqOpt - The magazine issuance frequency option (1:WEEKLY, 2:MONTHLY, 3:YEARLY).
      categoryOpt - The magazine category option (1:VARIETIES, 2:DESIGN, 3:SCIENTIFIC).
